column1: For when we accept that life is hard we will also realize that only through strength and character we have a chance of living a good life.
Dopamine is not about the pursuit of happiness but about the happiness of pursuit.
True happiness is not found in maximizing time spent in leisure activities. Rather it is a byproduct of voluntary efforts in the service of personal growth and meaningful goals.
Make your plan. Decide what kind of man you want to be. Develop the skills to be that man.
Do not sacrifice the thing you want for the thing that is supposed to get it.
